cast.name: Lena Sabine Berg Lena Sabine Berg

writer.name: 米莎·路文斯基 Micha Lewinsky

duration: Czech Republic: 82 分钟(Karlovy Vary Film Festival)
introduction: 桑德拉搬到另一所学校的一个新的地方，她是不是不舒服。类中的女孩没有考虑到她的生活圈子。但是，当她与14岁的迈克，谁住在街对面，她所有的问题似乎被人遗忘。她是头以上高跟鞋爱上了他。但是桑德拉并不知道纳迪亚是在与迈克的爱情也很长一段时间，纳迪亚不会容忍竞争...Thirteen-year-old Sandra isn't happy to be the new girl in town, but then she falls in love with Mike, the boy next door. Everything se ems perfect, until the day the young couple witness Mike's mother having an affair. Mike is devastated, but what he does not realise is that his mother's ardent lover is actually Sandras father, an old childhood sweetheart. Divided by her loyalty to her father and her feelings for Mike, Sandra decides to keep her father's identy a secret. However, she can't keep up the charade for much longer, and whatever she decides, it is bound to have serious consequences.
